phishing_challenge.question:
Subject: Urgent Account Verification
Dear User, your account will be suspended unless you verify your details at [link].
phishing_challenge.explanation: Suspicious link and urgent tone are common phishing tactics.

phishing_challenge.question:
Subject: Meeting Reminder
Hi, don't forget our team meeting tomorrow at 10 AM.
phishing_challenge.explanation: Legitimate emails from known contacts are usually safe.

password_strength.feedback: Great! Add unique characters for max strength.

privacy_quiz.scenario: You get a friend request on social media from someone you don't know. What should you do?
privacy_quiz.explanation: Unknown friend requests can lead to data harvesting.
